item.title: Add custom user attributes (claims)
item.description: Add custom user attributes (claims) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Description: Claims are user attributes that are returned in tokens. This is the R part of CRUD in “Manage user accounts” Links to original docs: Customize tokens returned from Okta with custom claims: https://developer.

item.title: Add the user groups claim
item.description: Add the user groups claim Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: Customize tokens returned from Okta with a Groups claim: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/customize-tokens-groups-claim/main/ Why is this here?: This doc is under Manage user accounts because it discuss return the user’s group information

item.title: Filter the groups claim with a dynamic allow list
item.description: Filter the groups claim with a dynamic allow list Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Description: This document discusses returning a filtered list of groups that pertain to the user and app. It reads and returns user/group information and pertains to the R aspect of user CRUD.
